anadhigamyajñānasya guṇā dānaśīlakṣamā 'naghāḥ apāpāḥ sa sevyatāṃ | bhavadbhir iti prakaraṇāt | dhairyyaśālina eva sevituṃ śaknuvantīti dhīrāḥ sambudhyate | nā—sti kṣayo vināśo yasya so 'kṣayaḥ sevāprayoyanam āha śriye trivargasampatyai amṛtāyāmaraṇāya ca atra mahaty anena buddhopalakṣyate vi—śeṣaṇamaryyādayā yathā'yam udayati mudrābhañjanaḥ padminīnām udayagirivanālībālamandārapuṣpaṃ | virahavidhur akokadvandvabandhur vvibhinvan_ kupi—takapikapolaḥ kroḍatāmras tamāṃsīti atra yathā padminīnāṃ mudrābhañjanāt__ mūrttyādayo lakṣayte tathā buddhānuyāyitvāt__  buddham evāpratipāditā rosudarśanavidveṣiṇām apravṛttir iti sākṣāt__ buddhopādānaṃ na kṛtaṃ || || durgāpakṣe || he āḥ viṣṇutulyā puruṣā u dhīrā pārvvatī sevyatāṃ ū śīve dhīrāḥ paṇḍitāḥ sā eva paṇḍitā jānātīti bhāvaḥ | pārvvatī sevane kiṃ phalaṃ tatrāha sa śriye śivasaṃpattaye | syatīti saḥ ṣo 'ntakarmmaṇi ceṣṭāyāṃ anyato 'pi ity ādi lābhaḥ yataḥ saṃhārarūpī | amṛtāya mokṣāya | tathā ca | caṇḍī | bhogasvargāpavargadā ity ādi | punaḥ kiṃ bhūtā akṣayā nāsti kṣayo vināśo yasyāḥ sā akṣayā iti bahuvrīhiḥ punaḥ kiṃbhūtā yasyajñānadayā yasyate idaṃ yasyaṃ yasūprayatne ity asmāt__ karmmaṇi sahāditvāt__ yaṅ prayatnaviśiṣṭam ity arthaḥ | yasyañ ca tat__jñānañ ceti yasyajñānaṃ tad dadātīti yasyajñānadaḥ śivaḥ yānaṃ yātāveś cida yasyajñānade śive yā gamanaṃ yasyāḥ saṅgatvāt__ puna kiṃ bhūtā sindhor agādhasyāḥ sindhaṃ amāpṛtya agādhasyā agādhaṃ syamati svanati anyato 'pīty ādi nābhaḥ tathā ca caṇḍī sanmānitānalādoṣeḥ satti hāsaṃ muhur muhur iti punaḥ kiṃ bhūtā anaghā apāpā nāsti kṣayaṃ pāpaṃ yasyā iti bahuvrīhiḥ sindhor ity atra ṣaṣṭhī cānādṛte iti ṣaṣṭhīty asaṃvistareṇa || || śleṣe viṣṇusevā pratipādyate | he dhīrā sa viṣṇuḥ sevyatāṃ yasya jñānadayāsindhoḥ jñānaṃ dadātīti jñānadā sarasvatī sā ca ī ca jñānadayau tābhyāṃ saṃpūrṇṇaḥ sindhur iva sindhuḥ agādhasya anadhigatamahimnaḥ tenāsatyarajastamāsi anaghāḥ sundhāḥ sa iti kriyāyā samucyate kathambhūtaḥ akṣayaḥ nityatvāt__ prayojanam āha striye lakṣmyai | śāstre 'pi sevako 'yaṃ | so 'yaṃ granthaḥ sevyatāṃ jñānadayā sindhor iva śāśtre parijñāneṣu jñānaṃ dadātīti jñānadā sarasvatī tasya ī sampattis tayā sindhur iva | vipulārthatvād agādhatvaṃ evaṃ bhūtasya yasya guṇāḥ prasādādayo 'nadyā adoṣāḥ | mukhyagamyatvāt__ kalpaparyyantasthāyitvāt__ akṣayo bhavaty eva | prayojanāha śriyo vidyā sampatyai amṛtāya mokṣāya etat__ parijñānāt__ jñānam ucyate jñānān muktir iti | samudramatve pi | jñānaṃ dadātīti jñānadā gadākāraṇe kāryyopacārāt__ jñānaśabdena muktir iti dhīyate | tayā upalakṣitaḥ sindhuḥ agādhasya atalasparśasya evaṃ bhūtasya yasya guṇā gāmbhīryyādayo 'nadyā apāpāḥ so 'pi akṣayo bhavaty eva | oṁ viṣṇus tasya kṣayo nivāsa iti vigrahaḥ | sa sevyatāṃ śriye yatas tatra śrījagatāṃ evaṃ amṛtāya ||

he dhīrāḥ sa bhagavān_ sevyatām ārādhyatāṃ dhairyaguṇaśālina eva sevituṃ śaknuvantīti tān eva sambodhayati prakṛtatvād_ yuṣmābhir hitecchubhiḥ sa kaḥ yasya guṇā maitrīkṣamādayo 'ṇimādayo vā anaghā niṣpāpā rāgādyasamvalitā iti yāvat | yad vā 'naghā hṛdyā anagho 'pāpahṛdyayor iti dharaṇiḥ | guṇyante 'bhyasyante guṇāḥ, guṇa cāmantraṇe, karmmaṇi ghañ_ kimbhūtasya jñānadayāsindhoḥ samastaviṣayāvabodhoḥ jñānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ svārtham anapekṣya paraduḥkhāpaharaṇecchā dayā tayor ambhtulyayoḥ sindhur iva sindhur iti rūpakaṃ prāpakaṃ | tābhyāṃ sindhur iva sindhur iti vā | prakṛtyāditvāt_ atra trivargasampattis tāṃ prāptuṃ kriyārthopapadasyety ādinā caturthī | tathā vyāḍīḥ lakṣmīsarasvatīdhītrivargasampad_vibhūtiśobhāsu | upakaraṇaveśaracanāvidhāsu ca śrīr iti prathiteti, amṛtāya mokṣāya ca cakāradvayam ubhayaprādhānyadyotanārthaṃ bhogocchubhiḥ śriye sumukṣubhir mokṣāyety arthaḥ | etena hitāhitajño hitaiṣī īśitā ca ataḥ sevārha iti viśeṣaṇānām abhiprāyaḥ | samudrapakṣe | sa sindhuḥ samudraḥ sevyatāṃ sa kaḥ yasyāgādhasyātalasparśasyākṣayasya sadāparipūrṇasya guṇā nairmalyādayo 'naghā hṛdyā ratnākaratvād atiśayasphuṭībhūtāḥ | jñānaṃ jñaptiḥ dā dānaṃ tayor īr lakṣmīr he anaghāḥ bhavadbhiḥ sa dhīrāḥ sevyatāṃ ārādhyatāṃ na aghaṃ pāpaṃ yeṣāṃ te 'naghā niḥpāpāḥ sukrtina iti yāvat_ dhiyaṃ rāti dadāti rā dāne asmāt karttari kvip_ dhīrā jñānaprado guruḥ prayojanam anuddiśya na maṃdo pi na pravarttate iti guru sevāyā phalam āha śriye cāmṛtāya ceti cadvayam ubhayoḥ prādhānyadyotanāya muktiprāptir gurusevāto bhavati kriyārthopapadasyeti caturthī tādarthe vā kīdṛśasya yasya guṇāḥ aṇimādayaḥ saṃti satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā kṣāṃtis tyāgaḥ saṃtoṣa ārjavaḥ śamo damas tapaḥ śāmyaṃ titikṣoparatiśrutaṃ jñānaṃ viraktir aiśvaryaṃ sauryaṃ tejo balaṃ smṛtiḥ svātaṃtryaṃ kauśalaṃ kāṃtidhairyamārdavam eva cety ādayo guṇāḥ
